joehung302 wrote:
> Would like to know if "crawl-delay" is implemented in Heritrix's 
> robots.txt policy. The version we use is Heritrix 1.12.0.

It does not. There is an open RFE to support it and the 'Allow' directive:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1

(It just happens to have been the first issue manually entered into the 
JIRA issue-tracking when it was new.)

Before 1.12.0, a 'Crawl-Delay' appearance in the middle of a group of 
'Disallow's would trick the crawler into thinking the rules for that 
group had ended. (<http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-4>)

- Gordon @ IA
